import React, { useState } from 'react' import Axios from 'axios' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { Redirect, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { login } from '../actions' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Table, Button, Form, Modal, Image } from 'react-bootstrap' const CartPage = () => { const { products } = useSelector((state) => { return { products: state.product.products } }) const [table, setTable] = React.useState([ Axios.get('http://localhost:2000/cart/get/:id') .then(res => (setTable(res.data))) .catch(err => console.log(err)) ]) return (
{ }

) } export default CartPage
